text: Ok you two it's bath time
WENDY, can you please help me get the twins ready for their bath?
WAAAHHH WAAAAHHHH!
SURE! Come on little ones..
Bath time can be so much fun
Let me show you how...

Bath Time Is the Best Time
It’s a time to have fun

Let’s go make some bubbles
But be careful, DON’T RUN!

Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub
Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub

Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub
Scrub-a-dub in the tub-tub-tub

Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub
Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub

Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub
Scrub-a-dub in the tub-tub-tub
I think it's working mom...
See guys bath time is fun!
HAHA. GOOD JOB WENDY,
Now let's get them good and clean.
Bath Time Is the Best Time
It’s a time to get clean

Let’s Rub Soap all over
Till you sparkle and Gleam

Clean your hair, with shampoo
Foam it up, rinse it through

Don’t get it, In your eyes
It can sting, make you cry

Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub
Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub

Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub
Scrub-a-dub in the tub-tub-tub
Bath Time Is the Best Time
Even ask Rubber Duck
Wash all Of your toys Up
You can scrub clean your truck

Sponge and Soap, wash it good
Clean it up just like you should

Don’t forget, rinse it nice
Rinse it once, rinse it twice

Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub
Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub

Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub
Scrub-a-dub in the tub-tub-tub

Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub
Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub

Scrub-a-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub-dub
Scrub-a-dub in the tub-tub-tub
We did it mom!
They're all clean and good as new
Couldn't have done it without you WENDY
Now the next challenge is getting these naughty twins into bed
OH BOY, I hadn't thought of that!
